QuestData.Title: On the Mend
QuestData.Description: Nisha will heal.$b$bThis ordeal has taken a toll on her. She needs water and rest.$b$bI will bring her to my camp and make her comfortable.$b$bWill you meet us there with some fresh water?
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover $1oa Quenching Waters from Steamfury elementals.
